title: Minswap TypeScript SDK
description: Minswap is one of the leading DEXs on Cardano. Other applications need an easy way to integrate Minswap for swapping tokens.
solution: Minswap SDK can be easily integrated in the frontend to embed a custom swap interface or construct an Alonzo swap transaction.
experience: Minswap has leading experience in integrating Alonzo smart contracts in the frontend. We have a fully integrated testnet to be released.
